ai-tha-ap298:1.1_0: “The Himalayas are falling from the Himalayas,
ai-tha-ap298:1.4_0: I was drunken on the rainy season.
ai-tha-ap298:2.1_0: I am the one who is the Buddha,
ai-tha-ap298:2.2_0: for the sake of the world.
ai-tha-ap298:2.3_0: And also to delight in sandalwood,
ai-tha-ap298:3.3_0: I’m not aware of any living creatures.
ai-tha-ap298:5.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Pūraṇa Kassapa.
